alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 6:57PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Muscogee and northeastern Chattahoochee Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 657 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Vista Terrace, or near Columbus, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... North Fort Benning, Saint Marys Hills, Edgewood, Highland Park, Kenwood, Eelbeck/West Fort Benning and Vista Terrace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
